sn35.21:1.1: “Monks, the arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the seer [and seen] is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
sn35.21:1.2: The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the hearer [and heard] …
sn35.21:1.6: and thinker [and thought] is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
sn35.21:2.1: The cessation, settling, and ending of the seer [and seen] is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.
sn35.21:2.2: The cessation, settling, and ending of the hearer [and heard],
sn35.21:2.6: and thinker [and thought] is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.”
